hero.title: Secure Your Dream 3BHK Flat For Sale in Sector 113 Gurugram Today
description: Sector 113 is emerging as the premier residential hotspot on the Dwarka Expressway, offering unparalleled connectivity and lifestyle amenities. If you are searching for spacious, modern living, our curated selection of 3BHK flats for sale in Sector 113 Gurugram presents the ideal opportunity. These properties are designed for the discerning family, featuring large balconies, high-end fittings, and expansive living areas that maximize natural light.

Investing here means securing a future in a rapidly developing area close to IGI airport and key business districts. Explore inventory from top builders and find the perfect ready-to-move 3BHK home that matches your aspirations for luxury and convenience in the National Capital Region.

featuresSection.heading: Key Features Defining Luxury 3BHK Flats for Sale in Sector 113 Gurugram
description: Sector 113 stands out due to its strategic positioning right off the operational stretch of the Dwarka Expressway. This ensures swift access to Delhi, the Aerocity commercial hub, and central Gurugram, eliminating unnecessary commute times. The residential development here is meticulously planned, prioritizing open spaces, green areas, and robust modern infrastructure.

When looking for a 3BHK flat in Sector 113, you are not just buying an apartment; you are investing in a comprehensive lifestyle ecosystem. We partner only with reputable developers who guarantee timely delivery and superior build quality. From proximity to reputable schools and world-class hospitals to buzzing retail centers and fine dining options, Sector 113 offers everything a modern family needs within easy reach. This area represents the perfect balance of connectivity and tranquil residential living in Gurugram.

features.title: Spacious Layouts
features.description: Our 3BHK units are designed with optimal space utilization, providing large living rooms and generously sized bedrooms. Enjoy dedicated utility areas and expansive balconies that offer spectacular views and ample space for relaxation or family gatherings.

features.title: Premium Amenities
features.description: Residents gain access to world-class facilities including state-of-the-art clubhouses, temperature-controlled swimming pools, fully equipped gyms, and dedicated sports courts. These amenities enhance daily living and promote a healthy, community-focused lifestyle within the complexes.

features.title: Connectivity Advantage
features.description: Located adjacent to the Dwarka Expressway and highly accessible from NH-48, Sector 113 offers seamless travel. IGI Airport Terminal 3 is just a short drive away, making domestic and international travel incredibly convenient for frequent flyers and business travelers.

features.title: High Rental Yield Potential
features.description: Due to its rapid infrastructure development and excellent connectivity to major business hubs like Cyber City and Aerocity, 3BHK flats in Sector 113 command attractive rental returns, making them an excellent investment asset.

features.title: Modern Security Systems
features.description: Safety is paramount in Sector 113 residential complexes. Enjoy peace of mind with integrated security features including 24/7 CCTV surveillance, boom barriers, video door phones, and dedicated security personnel patrolling the premises.

features.title: Vastu Compliant Design
features.description: Many properties available feature architectural designs adhering strictly to Vastu Shastra principles. This thoughtful planning ensures positive energy flow, enhancing the overall harmony and well-being of the residents in their new 3BHK home.

locationsSection.title: Strategic Proximity to Key Infrastructure near Sector 113 Gurugram
description: Sector 113 is defined by its strategic proximity to essential infrastructure and upcoming commercial hubs. This location is part of the robust development along the Dwarka Expressway corridor, ensuring high future appreciation potential for your 3BHK investment. Key connectivity points include seamless access to NH-48 and a short drive to the Indira Gandhi International Airport IGI.

Furthermore, the sector benefits from established social infrastructure in neighboring areas like Sector 109 and Sector 110, providing access to top-tier educational institutions, healthcare facilities, and vibrant shopping complexes. For professionals, the proximity to Cyber City and other business parks makes the daily commute manageable and efficient. Our listings focus on properties that maximize this location advantage, ensuring that your 3BHK flat in Sector 113 offers both a luxurious retreat and practical urban living in Gurugram.

whyChoose.title: Why Investing in a 3BHK Flat in Sector 113 Gurugram is the Smart Choice
description: Choosing Sector 113 means prioritizing a lifestyle that blends urban sophistication with residential comfort. The area is strategically planned under the Gurugram Manesar Urban Complex GMUC master plan, guaranteeing structured development and robust infrastructure for all residents. Unlike older sectors, Sector 113 benefits from new age planning, ensuring wider internal roads, underground wiring, and efficient utility management systems.

We guide you through the entire purchase process, ensuring transparency in documentation and clear understanding of RERA compliance. A 3BHK flat here provides substantial space required for modern nuclear families while guaranteeing excellent appreciation potential driven by the ongoing infrastructure upgrades, especially the completion of the full Dwarka Expressway loop. This is truly where connectivity meets luxury in Gurugram.

points.description: Sector 113 acts as a crucial residential gateway, offering the best of both worlds. You get the superior infrastructure and planned development of Gurugram while maintaining rapid access to the cultural and commercial opportunities presented by the adjacent areas of Delhi, particularly Dwarka.

faqSection.title: Common Questions About Buying a 3BHK Flat in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Get detailed answers to the most frequently asked questions regarding pricing, infrastructure, RERA status, and the future growth prospects of 3BHK properties in Sector 113 along the Dwarka Expressway corridor.

faqs.question: What is the typical price range for a 3BHK flat for sale in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The pricing for a 3BHK flat in Sector 113 varies significantly based on the developer, project specific amenities, floor level, and overall unit size. Generally, prices start from approximately INR 150 Crores and can go upwards of INR 300 Crores for ultra-luxury developments. We recommend speaking with our property experts who can provide precise current market rates and tailor financial options based on your budget and specific requirements for a ready-to-move apartment.

faqs.question: Is Sector 113 a good long-term investment location for residential property
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 113 is considered an excellent long-term investment location, primarily because of its strategic position on the Dwarka Expressway. This connectivity guarantees future infrastructure upgrades and increased demand. As surrounding areas mature, Sector 113 is poised for substantial capital appreciation, often outperforming sectors further away from central Gurugram and Delhi access points. The area is projected to be a key residential hub in the next five years.

faqs.question: Are the 3BHK projects in Sector 113 RERA compliant and safe to invest in
faqs.answer: All reputable residential projects offering 3BHK flats for sale in Sector 113 are strictly RERA compliant. We ensure that our listed properties possess all necessary government clearances and RERA registration numbers. This compliance provides buyers with increased security regarding construction timelines, quality assurance, and transparency in documentation, protecting your investment from potential disputes.

faqs.question: What is the connectivity status of Sector 113 to the IGI Airport and Cyber City
faqs.answer: Sector 113 offers superb connectivity. Via the Dwarka Expressway, the Indira Gandhi International Airport IGI is typically reachable within 20 to 30 minutes, depending on traffic conditions. Cyber City, the major commercial hub, is also well-connected, accessible usually within a 35 to 45 minute drive via the major arterial roads, making it highly convenient for corporate professionals seeking a premium 3BHK residence.

faqs.question: Are there good schools and hospitals near the 3BHK flats in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqs.answer: The social infrastructure surrounding Sector 113 is rapidly developing. Residents have access to high-quality educational institutions like DPS, St. Xavier's, and numerous highly regarded international schools in the adjacent sectors. Leading healthcare facilities, including Columbia Asia Hospital and other multi-specialty centers, are located within a 15 to 20 minute drive, ensuring comprehensive amenities are always close by.

faqs.question: Do the 3BHK apartments in Sector 113 offer power backup and water supply assurance
faqs.answer: Yes, all modern residential complexes in Sector 113 providing 3BHK units offer 100% power backup facilities, ensuring uninterrupted electricity supply even during grid outages. Furthermore, these societies have robust water management systems, including borewell usage and municipal water connections, guaranteeing a reliable and consistent water supply for all residential needs.

faqs.question: What kind of amenities can I expect when purchasing a luxury 3BHK flat here
faqs.answer: Luxury 3BHK flats in Sector 113 typically come loaded with premium amenities designed for high-end living. These include expansive clubhouses, temperature-controlled swimming pools, dedicated jogging tracks, indoor games rooms, spa and sauna facilities, and meticulously maintained landscaped gardens. Some projects also offer concierge services and integrated smart home technology.

faqs.question: What are the common possession timelines for new 3BHK projects in Sector 113
faqs.answer: Sector 113 has a mix of inventory. Many established projects are already offering ready-to-move 3BHK flats, allowing for immediate possession. For newer projects under construction, the typical possession timeline ranges from 24 to 36 months from the date of booking. We always prioritize showing you projects with minimal construction risk and strong delivery track records.

faqs.question: How spacious are the typical 3BHK unit sizes in this Sector
faqs.answer: The carpet area and super area for 3BHK flats in Sector 113 are generally quite generous compared to apartments in older Gurugram sectors. Unit sizes typically range from 1600 square feet to over 2200 square feet in super area, ensuring ample room for three bedrooms, a large living room, dining area, and multiple balconies, perfect for family life.

faqs.question: Can foreign nationals purchase a 3BHK flat for sale in Sector 113 Gurugram
faqs.answer: Yes, Foreign Nationals and Persons of Indian Origin PIO are legally permitted to purchase residential property in India, including 3BHK flats in Sector 113, subject to compliance with the Foreign Exchange Management Act FEMA regulations. Our legal team can assist international buyers with the specific documentation and procedural requirements needed for a smooth transaction.
